children.name: am
children.sourceText: I am no devil, for there is none,

children.name: astray
children.sourceText: Go and reclaim this people, for they have all gone astray after an unknown God.There is no God;

children.name: be
children.sourceText: Partake of the forbidden fruit, and ye shall not die, but ye shall be as God, knowing good and evil.
